title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - Contemporary Devasena Design
materials: featuring a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Modern geometric design featuring three interconnected diamond-studded squares. The leaf-shaped embellishments on either side add a touch of organic elegance. The pave setting of the diamonds maximizes their sparkle.
colors: Yellow Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a modern twist on a traditional muhurtham piece.
description: A modern take on the traditional Mangalsutra, representing the sacred bond of marriage with a contemporary aesthetic. The brilliance of the diamonds symbolizes everlasting love and commitment. This piece showcases superior craftsmanship and is perfect for the modern Telugu bride or woman who appreciates fine jewelry with a touch of tradition.
